days.text: Slight flooding may occur in Inner Harbour area from 0 ~ 3 am due to astronomical tide. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 5 to 6 north to northwesterly winds with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northwesterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
